title: [K-12] Effective Strategies for Academic Reading and Utilization of Library Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Scholarly resource search capabilities and basic reading proficiency
context.additional_context: Hybrid operation combining smartphone-based online lectures (60%) + offline workshops (40%), with practice-oriented design to improve access to library resources

learning_goals: Ability to search and select topic-relevant journal articles from academic databases within 30 minutes
Ability to distinguish and explain reading patterns (in-depth analysis/overview comprehension) according to research objectives
Ability to perform e-book borrowing and reservation procedures using an Online Public Access Catalog (OPAC) system
Understanding of copyright regulations for academic materials and application of appropriate citation methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
